title: Getting Skins from Riot missed to reedem it
body: In the preseason i log in and saw i got some rewards(heared from friends they were skin/skins) untill i read all the notifications the claim button in the top right corner disapeared, is there a way to check what i got? Tryed going to store,account,gift history but there is nothing...

replies.body: Xaeros has some good info here, you should be able to check your rewards through the purchase history panel.  It looks like you received your Honor 5 Ward Skin reward, grats.  :D

Hi S0FTY,

If you are referring to the "Rune Archivist" mission rewards (for having purchased a rune page with RP before the 2017 season), then you can find a record of what you unlocked in your "Purchase History".

You can find your "Purchase History" in the **Store**, click on the **Account** button (to the right of the **Purchase RP** button, and then selecting **Purchase History**. Your free skins should show up as non-refundable 0-cost purchases. You can check the timestamp to make sure they line up with when you completed the mission :)
